Home.name: David Cerdeira
Home.subtitle: My name is David, I'm a frontend developer based in Lisbon, Portugal. I have a passion for all things technology and design, from software engineering to UI/UX.

About.title: About
About.greeting: Hi. I'm David, nice to meet you. Take a look around.
About.contentTop: I'm a front-end developer and I enjoy building beautiful, simple and aesthetic designs. I'm also very interested in video games and mobile apps.
About.contentBot: If I'm not coding, you will find me learning languages, playing piano, working out or travelling around the world.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.subtitle: Here are some of the latest projects I developed.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.subtitle: I would love to hear from you. Whether it's a project, job opportunity or just a chat. Feel free to contact me.
